name: vividness
content:

the quality of being very clear, powerful and detailed in your mind: Parts of the novel now seem a little old-fashioned, but it's still a work of tremendous power and vividness. His use of quotes brings the conflict alive with a terrible vividness.
the quality of being very brightly coloured : His palette was rich, going from luminous reds and glowing oranges to blues of stained glass vividness. Some of the painting is remarkable for clearness of outline and vividness of colour. See
vivid
More examplesFewer examplesThere are no limits to his ability to conjure up vividness of detail.Work on the clarity and vividness of your talk.What I remember is the box, and the vividness of the scene emblazoned on its lid.
